price: ߘߎ߱ ߛߍ߲ߞߍߕߐ߫ ߊ߬ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ߟߏ߲ ߡߍ߲ ߞߊߟߌߦߊ߫ ߘߐ߫ ߸ ߏ߬ ߦߋ߫ ߟߊ߬ߘߍ߫ ߣߐ߲߰ߡߊ߲߬ߓߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߘߌ߫ ߒ߬ߠߎ߫ ߡߊ߬
arabic: يَوۡمَ تَشَقَّقُ ٱلۡأَرۡضُ عَنۡهُمۡ سِرَاعٗاۚ ذَٰلِكَ حَشۡرٌ عَلَيۡنَا يَسِيرٞ

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: yawma tashaqqaqu al-arḍu ʿanhum sirāʿan dhālika ḥashrun ʿalaynā yasīrun
